instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Calendar app . Tap Create . Tap Event . Type in the information about your event. When you enter more details like location or date, you'll see suggestions that you can choose to use. Tap Done . Optional: If you have more than one calendar and want to change which one you're adding the event to, go to the top and tap the calendar name.
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google Calendar app . Open the event you want to edit. Tap Edit . Make changes to your event, then tap Done .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google Calendar app . Open the event you want to delete. In the top right, tap More . Tap Delete and then Delete event .
